definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the management of pyogenic osteomyelitis of the spine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脊柱化膿性骨髓炎的手術治療方法。

sentences.english: His foot began to fester and he was in great pain when he tried to walk.
sentences.chinese: 它的腳開始化膿，一邁步便一陣劇痛。

sentences.english: Exclusively pyogenic, gas was present in 27% of the LA.
sentences.chinese: 氣體出現於肝膿瘍者佔27%，皆爲化膿性者。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the procedure and effect on treating septic arthritis of temporomandibular joint (TMJ).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討化膿性顳下頜關節炎的治療方法及其療效。

sentences.english: A "hot" joint that is swollen and tender may indicate an acute suppurative arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 腫且有壓痛的“熱”關節可能提示急性化膿性關節炎。

sentences.english: Pyogenic granulomas are the most common benign vascular tumors or tumor-like lesions.
sentences.chinese: 良性病變中化膿性肉芽腫最多。

sentences.english: Pyogenic sacroiliitis is a rarely occurring disease.
sentences.chinese: 化膿性骶髂關節炎是一種很少發生的疾病。

sentences.english: Conclusion:More attention should be paid to prevention of pyogenic corneal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 結論化膿性角膜潰瘍危害極大，應重在預防。

sentences.english: It can fester in those wide open spaces for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 那東西在那些空曠了千百年的地方會化膿爛掉。

sentences.english: It has two distinct presentations, acute hemorrhagic enteritis and non-suppurative myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 以急性出血性腸炎和非化膿性心肌炎爲特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical efficiency and side-effect in the patients with pyogenic granuloma treated with Ho laser.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察鈥激光治療化膿性肉芽腫的療效和不良反應。

sentences.english: When it is accompanied with secondary infection, it form acute purulent inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 霰粒腫如繼發感染而形成急性化膿性炎症。

sentences.english: Other causes of parotid swelling are suppurative parotitis .
sentences.chinese: 腮腺腫脹的其它原因是化膿性腮腺炎。

sentences.english: The festering wound has plagued me for several days.
sentences.chinese: 化膿的傷口已經摺騰我好幾天了。

sentences.english: Presenting symptoms are usually wound site pain with cellulitis and purulent drainage.
sentences.chinese: 症狀通常是傷口疼痛和化膿性蜂窩組織炎排水。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of the acute suppurative osteomyelitis of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒急性化膿性骨髓炎的診斷和治療方法。

definition: lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
